tool_description: Tracks and predicts plant phenological stages based on environmental conditions and species-specific development patterns.

current_stage.description: Observed growth stage: dormant, budding, leafing, flowering, fruiting, seeding, senescence

temperature_avg_celsius.description: Average temperature over past week in Celsius

previous_observations.description: Previous phenological stages observed this season

error_messages: Invalid date format: Use ISO 8601 date-time format
Invalid phenological stage: Use one of [dormant, budding, leafing, flowering, fruiting, seeding, senescence]
Temperature out of range: Must be between -40 and 50 Celsius
Invalid precipitation: Must be 0 or positive value
Invalid daylight hours: Must be between 0 and 24 hours
Species not found: The specified species is not in the phenological database
usage: Record current phenological stage observations along with environmental conditions. The tool predicts upcoming stages and optimal harvest windows.

development_rate.description: Current development rate: slow, normal, fast, accelerated

stage_confidence.description: Confidence in stage prediction from 0.0 to 1.0
